alert.note: Alert for Nowata (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:59AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Craig, northern Rogers and Nowata Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 359 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of South Coffeyville to 7 miles west of Nowata to 2 miles south of Talala. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Nowata... Chelsea... South Coffeyville... Delaware... Lenapah... Talala... New Alluwe... Watova... Centralia... Centrailia... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
